pullRequest.title: JEP 360 edge cases
pullRequest.bodyText:
ClassFormatException should be thrown if SealedClass has 0 permitted subclasses
PermittedSubclass verification error should not be thrown for class versions other than 59.65536

Related to: #9626
Signed-off-by: Theresa Mammarella Theresa.T.Mammarella@ibm.com
fyi @ChengJin01

commit.message:
JEP 360 edge cases

- ClassFormatException should be thrown if SealedClass has 0 permitted subclasses
- PermittedSubclass verification error should not be thrown for class versions other than 59.65536

Signed-off-by: Theresa Mammarella <Theresa.T.Mammarella@ibm.com>

nodes.bodyText: I am not quite sure whether U_16 numberOfClasses = 0; are compiled successfully in this way on all platform. Please adjust accordingly if not.
